text: Jesus ga helekai, “Au e hagi adu gi goodou di tonu bolo goodou ala ne daudali mai Au la gaa noho gi hongo nia lohongo aamua e madangaholu maa lua, gaa dagi nia madawaawa madangaholu maa lua o Israel, i di madagoaa Tama Tangada gaa noho i hongo dono lohongo king madamada, i di madagoaa e haga hoou ai nia mee huogodoo.19.28 Matthew 25.31; Luke 22.30
